name: Soul's Paradox
description:
Our hero has been sent by an independence group seeking to understand the entire history of the war on a battlefield known but not listed in the various archives. 

On the spot, he discovers the power of the two clans, but above all notices strange things about the local fauna & flora, unknown clothes or objects that would have their place in a museum. As he explores, he understands that these ruins did not harbor a Water VS Plant war, but an alliance against a common enemy, who, in order not to lose, trapped the place in a temporal paradox. And this common enemy is the player. When he learns this, the temporal mechanism engages its last phase and the loop begins again...

Our protagonist is capable of shifting between different version of the reality, seen as a forest spirit or a water spirit. Use this ability wisely to discover the strange ruin.

Controls:

W - Move forward

S - Move backward

Right - Look right

Left - Look left

Up - Look up

Down - Look down

E - Use / take

Space - Switch

By switching souls, you can dodge some attacks (just a helping had (thank you Mamijomale))
